alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Okanogan Valley; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of central Douglas, eastern Chelan, south central Okanogan and northeastern Grant Counties through 930 AM PDT... At 859 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 14 miles south of Bridgeport to 11 miles northwest of Lakeview. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Banks Lake South, Coulee City, Mansfield, Sims Corner, Dry Falls Junction, Leahy, Stratford, Withrow, Nilles Corner, Farmer, Azwell, and Mold. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 2 in Washington between mile markers 162 and 198. U.S. Highway 97 in Washington between mile markers 246 and 250. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Okanogan Valley; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area
